price: Say, “In Whose Hand is the dominion of all things – and He gives protection while none can protect against Him – if you really know?”
arabic: قُلۡ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
